entry.title: Russian Forces Close In on Ukraine's Capital as Kyiv Prepares to Fight
entry.content: Russian forces attacked by land and air Friday, while Ukrainian soldiers and civilians dug in to defend the capital. Ukraine’s president vowed not to surrender.

entry.title: Ukrainians Throng Borders Fleeing Russian Invasion
entry.content: Tens of thousands of Ukrainians have already crossed into Poland and other neighboring countries in an exodus that the United Nations says could grow to four million.

entry.title: How the West Misread Vladimir Putin
entry.content: For years, the former KGB officer railed against U.S. domination, assailed the post-Cold War order and sent repeated signals that he intended to widen Russia’s sphere of influence. Nonetheless, until recently few imagined he would launch a full-scale invasion of Ukraine.

entry.title: Ukraine's Leader Zelensky Is 'Target Number One' for Putin
entry.content: Russia’s invasion of Ukraine aims to overthrow the leadership in Kyiv, but President Volodymyr Zelensky remains defiant.
